rss_import_settings.comment: Json array of the extensions settings
rss_import_settings.name: rss_import_settings

params.name: code_challenge
params.comment: The PKCE code challenge, if one was provided by the client

params.name: code_challenge
params.comment: The PKCE code challenge, if one was provided by the client

params.name: code_challenge_method
params.comment: The PKCE code challenge method, if applicable

params.name: code_challenge_method
params.comment: The PKCE code challenge method, if applicable

params.name: oauth_pkce
params.comment: Required PKCE method.

params.name: show_badge
params.comment: Show a badge?

params.name: oauth_graphql
params.comment: A boolean indicating if this client (and access tokens issued by it) can access the GraphQL API

params.name: oauth_prompt
params.comment: How to prompt users. login = Users must always login. reauthorize = Users are shown authorize screen. automatic = Users with an existing access token skip authorise screen. none = Never show screen

params.name: oauth_type
params.comment: A hint for how to display the form (NULL is generic custom)

params.name: prompt
params.comment: The requested prompt type

params.name: ref
params.comment: URL to redirect the user to after validation is complete

params.name: default
params.comment: Default options

params.name: disabled
params.comment: Disabled options

params.name: preference
params.comment: The chosen notification method(s)

params.name: auth_user_agent
params.comment: The user agent that the user performed authentication on, if known

params.name: issue_user_agent
params.comment: The user agent that the access token was issued to, if known

params.name: device_key
params.comment: The device key of the device used to obtain this access token, if known

params.name: user_agent
params.comment: The user agent that the user performed authentication on, if known

params.name: device_key
params.comment: The device key of the device used to obtain this authorization code, if known

app.name: app
app.comment: The application key for the item

position.name: position
position.comment: This item's position within the bar

permissions.name: permissions
permissions.comment: Comma-delimited list of group IDs, or * for all, NULL to inherit

params.name: word_is_custom
params.comment: Word is custom to the site?

api_key.comment: The API key which owns this webhook
api_key.name: api_key

events.comment: Comma-delimited list of events to fire for
events.name: events

url.comment: The URL to send webhook to
url.name: url

filters.name: filters
filters.comment: JSON-encoded array of filters for each event

time.name: time
time.comment: Unix timestamp of when it was requested

fails.name: fails
fails.comment: The number of times we have tried (and failed) to send

params.name: mlog_notification_sent
params.comment: Whether this has been sent in an AdminCP notification

params.name: token_id_token
params.comment: ID token for Open ID Connect implementations
